actions.recommendation: Your kidney function is on the lower normal side with some protein picked up in your urine. Please do the urine prot:creat that was requested and repeat blood test in 3/12
Gastroenterology referral for Colonoscopy to have screening done. You have 2 irregular lesions on your right index finger - You have been referred to a dermatologist
Fasting insulin is slightly raised as well as your uric acid. Please cut down on red meat and I suggest that you see a dietician to assist you in building a healthier diet plan for you.
Your Vit D level can be optimised. Please supplement with Vit D 3 5000iu daily and repeat levels in 3/12
